text: Boaz Mauda, born on the 23th of April, 1987 in Elyakim, Israel. He won the fifth season of Kokhav Nolad, the Israeli version of Pop Idol, and represented Israel in the Eurovision Song Contest 2008, finishing in 9th place. His voice has been described as somewhere between David D'Or and Dana International. ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Israeli singers Category:Jewish Israeli musicians
title: Boaz Ma'uda
